Class DefaultLivenessProbe

java.lang.Object
com.github.timmy80.mia.core.Terminal<ProbesTask>
com.github.timmy80.mia.core.ProbeHandlerTerm
com.github.timmy80.mia.core.DefaultLivenessProbe
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExecutionStage
public class DefaultLivenessProbe extends ProbeHandlerTerm
The default liveness probe handler.
Simply check that no Task is hung for more than 20seconds.
Completes with status 200 OK if all the tasks are OK. Completes with 500 INTERNAL ERROR otherwise.
Author:
anthony
